name: Pineapple Pen - Apple Arrow Shooter Ambush Edition
name_original: Pineapple Pen - Apple Arrow Shooter Ambush Edition
description:
*** PEN is mightier then APPLE! It is Pen Ambush ***
The Pineapple Mania is unleashed, Are you ready to experience the P.P.A.P. feeling? You have PENs and you have APPLEs and PINEAPPLEs. The rest is up to you! MAKE as many PEN APPLES and PEN PINEAPPLES as you can and SHARE with your social friends.

GAMEPLAY: Tap your screen to shoot the PEN to your target APPLE or PINEAPPLE without hitting any other PENS. Pass through hundreds of very unique levels!

Easy TAP Control:
- TAP to SHOOT the PEN
- AVOID other PENS
- More than 1100 Levels
- Compete other players world wide in game leaderboards

Develop your best strategy to SHOOT PEN with the perfect timing and placement. SHOOT PEN at the APPLE or PINEAPPLE target avoid hitting other PENs.

Challenge your friends to find out which one of you is the true master of the PEN! Pineaple Pen Ambush!

Pineapple Pen - Apple Shooter Pen Ambush is one of the "best" stress relief app for iOS devices.

—
All credits to Piko-Taro ピコ太郎 and Rika & Riko
